FacilityName: Wayne Farms LLC - Decatur Further Processing

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Wayne Farms LLC - Decatur Further Processing is a poultry processing facility that stores and uses a chemical that is regulated by EPA's Risk Management Program.
Wayne Farms believes the ammonia we store and handle on site has a very real and potential danger.  However, it is important to keep the risks in perspective.  Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing's ammonia storage and handling facilities:
1.  are properly designed
2.  have effective operation and maintenance procedures
3.  employ trained operators and tecchnicians
4.  periodically conduct safety audits, and
5.  are constantly upgrading its processes to meet or exceed industry standards

Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing  also has taken a proactive approach towards coordinating emergency efforts with the Decatur Fire Department.  The Fire Department has a copy of our emergency response program and is well trained and prepared to respond to the potential spills and leaks that may occur at the Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing facility.   Decatur Fire Department conducts annula site visits to our facility.

A facility which maintains high standards, such as Wayne Farms LLC- Decatur Further Processing provides less public risk than a facility that does not provide safe operations.   Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing complies with Federal OSHA rules and guidelines for safe handling, storage and operation of chemical systems.  We also utilize outside experts to periodically inspect our system's integrity,  train system operators and upgrade systems to improve safety.  There has been no reportable releases of ammonia at Wayne Farms LLC-Decatur Further Proessing during the past 5 years.
Wayne Farms LLC - Decatur Further Processing uses EPA's OCA Guidance for off-site consequence analysis of ammonia.

CONCLUSION
Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing believes that the poultry industry should proactively inform the public of the potential dangers and the actions th

at Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing has taken to minimize these dangers.  Wayne Farms LLC -  Decatur Further Processing has had a great relationship with the community.  We encourage any and all citizens who have concerns or questions to contact our facility.  We look forward to continuing our relationship in Morgan County.
